properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, FC.FOOD_NAME, B.GOOD, B.CREATE_DATE, M.USERID, M.POINT FROM BOARD B JOIN BMEMBER M USING (USERNO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN FOOD_BOARD FB USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN F_CATEGORY FC ON (FC.FOOD_CATEGORY = fb.food_category) WHERE c.category_no = 3 AND FB.DETAIL_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY GOOD DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, FC.FOOD_NAME, B.GOOD, B.BAD, B.REPORT, B.CREATE_DATE, M.USERID, M.POINT, FB.ADDRESS, B.USERNO FROM BOARD B JOIN BMEMBER M ON (B.USERNO = M.USERNO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.BOARD_TYPE = C.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN FOOD_BOARD FB USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN F_CATEGORY FC ON (FC.FOOD_CATEGORY = fb.food_category) WHERE c.category_no = 3 AND FB.DETAIL_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ?

INSERT ALL INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO,USERNO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 3, ?, ?) INTO FOOD_BOARD (BOARD_NO,FOOD_CATEGORY,ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, SEQ_FCNO.NEXTVAL,?) INTO F_CATEGORY VALUES (SEQ_FCNO.CURRVAL, ?) INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?,?,?,SYSDATE, DEFAULT) SELECT * FROM DUAL

INSERT ALL INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO,USERNO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 3, ?, ?) INTO FOOD_BOARD (BOARD_NO,FOOD_CATEGORY,ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?) INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?,?,?,SYSDATE, DEFAULT) SELECT * FROM DUAL
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT = REPORT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET STATUS = 'N', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM F_CATEGORY WHERE FOOD_NAME = ?
INSERT INTO F_CATEGORY VALUES (SEQ_FCNO.NEXTVAL, ?)
UPDATE FOOD_BOARD SET FOOD_CATEGORY = SEQ_FCNO.CURRVAL, ADDRESS = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = ?, BOARD_CONTENT = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE FOOD_BOARD SET FOOD_CATEGORY = ?, ADDRESS = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

SELECT ADDRESS, FOOD_NAME, BOARD_NO, GOOD FROM BOARD B JOIN FOOD_BOARD FB USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN F_CATEGORY FC ON (FB.FOOD_CATEGORY = FC.FOOD_CATEGORY) WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%'||?||'%' AND GOOD > 5 ORDER BY GOOD DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BC.USERNO, BTNTYPE FROM BOARD B JOIN BTNCHECK BC USING (BOARD_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = ? AND BC.USERNO = ?
DELETE FROM BTNCHECK WHERE USERNO = ?
INSERT INTO BTNCHECK VALUES (?, ?, ?)
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT = REPORT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD - 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD - 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT = REPORT - 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
DELETE BTNCHECK WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USERNO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET GOOD = GOOD-1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET BAD = BAD-1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BOARD SET REPORT = REPORT-1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE BTNCHECK SET BTNTYPE = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USERNO = ?
SELECT BOARD_NO, USERNO, BTNTYPE FROM BTNCHECK WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND USERNO = ?
SELECT SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNOCURRVAL, ?,?,?,SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT * FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
DELETE FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE BOARD_NO = ?

INSERT ALL INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO,USERNO, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, 3, ?, ?) INTO FOOD_TOGETHER (BOARD_NO, MAINADDRESS, SUBADDRESS, PERSON, END_TIME) VALUES (SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL,?,?,?,?) INTO ATTACHMENT VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?,?,?,SYSDATE, DEFAULT) SELECT * FROM DUAL

SELECT CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TITLE, PERSON, END_TIME, USERID, FILE_PATH FROM BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT A USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN FOOD_TOGETHER F USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN BMEMBER M ON (B.USERNO = M.USERNO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y'
